resources.string: Use the bottom left menu button to add a column
Please set your access token from the account settings.
You need to set an account to post a toot.
The file is bigger than the limit of %1$dMB.
Please wait until last operation is over.
Boost this status from %1$s ? It\'s shown to all followers and on your profile page.
Favourite this status from %1$s ? Notification will be sent to its author.
This account will be deleted and all the columns will be removed.\nAre you sure?
Go to column list when pressing \"Back\"
Account is not set up.Please add account.
Swipe to delete. Long press to sort. Changes will be applied when reloading the view.
You can\'t switch accounts while there is media attachment.
Could not follow the non-public user
You need to clarify your reason for reporting
Please take the time to review the app.
prior local URL when open attachment
You can\'t close this column (check column settings).
Your notification(s) on the server will be deleted.\nAre you sure?
>Swipe leftwards to delete. Reload columns to show statuses published by unmuted apps.
Read only public data on the server without log in.
Exit app when trying to close protected column with \"Back\" button without confirmation
Missing app permission to access media.
Nickname and color (if specified, it\'s shown instead of full acct)
The change of nickname/color will be applied after reload column.
Show \"Follow\" button in button bar (app restart required)
Send follow request from %2$s to the locked user %1$s?
seems the follow request can\'t be removed by its sender…
this message contains hashtags, but message visibility is not public. normally hashtags are searchable only in public messages. Are you sure?
Disable auto-refresh when returning to the app.
Keep the screen on when using the app.
You can\'t close the column using the \"Back\" button when multiple columns are shown.
Minimum column width (default=300dp, app restart required)
Media Thumbnail height (default=64dp, app restart required)
Thanks to フタバ for the application icon.

Android 7.0 can only use the elliptic curve "prime256v1".
Unfortunately your server seems to not support it.
This bug has been fixed in Android 7.1.1.
You can either upgrade your OS or ask the server administrator to add support to the elliptic curve "prime256v1".
See also https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=224438
The account used to make this draft has been removed from this app. The following context can not be restored: in_reply_to, media attachment
The reply origin referred by the draft has been lost. The following context is removed: in_reply_to
Some of the media attachments in the draft have been lost.

You can export data to any app that can receive data, but maybe you can import data only from device's storage or Google drive.
Column background image may be not exported/imported over device.
Timeline font is not exported/imported.
Custom notification sound may be not exported/imported over device.
Existing data (before import) will be cleared. Are you sure?
Don\'t crop media thumbnail (app restart required)
There is also an account setting to turn notifications off/on.
Could not switch account. Old draft data has no in_reply_to_url, can\'t convert in_reply_to for selected server.
Prioritise Google Chrome (if \"Custom Tabs\" is turned on)
Show button bar at the top of posting screen

Timeline font size
(Unit:sp. leave empty to default. app restart required)
…
…
Acct font size (Unit:sp. leave empty to default. app restart required)
Search function is unavailable on pseudo account .
Mute more notifications for this conversation
Unmute more notifications for this conversation
Specify access token instead of normal user authentication. (advanced)
Access token (if using Misskey, please input API token)
Format of \"Quote name\" (set text that contains %1$s)
(sample)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
Enable GIF animation (Wastes a lot of battery)
Show mention as full acct (column reload required)
Information on remote profile pages may not be displayed accurately. Press here to view the profile in web browser.
This setting is used to adjust notification for %1$s
Notification style (pre Android 8. if your device is Android 8.0+, please check the account setting)
Disable IME Action button when using \"Quick Toot\" bar (app restart required)
Auto hide long text (by setting \"line counts\" greater than 0. app restart required)
Enquete choice %1$d is too long. Please decrease by %2$d character(s).
Enquete choice %1$d is a duplicate of another choice.
\"%1$s\" is too long (%2$d/%3$d characters).\nIt is not acceptable in the standard server, but it may be acceptable in some servers.\nAre you sure?
Short acct for local user (app restart required)
If on a destructed server, please remove its account from app.
Can\'t get visibility setting in web app.
The media MIME type %1$s is not accepted. \nSupported MIME types are image/jpeg, image/png, image/gif, video/webm and video/mp4.
Disable custom Emoji animation (app restart and column reload required)
Allow non-space character before emoji shortcode (Affect to display and post. to set display, please restart app and reload column. The emojis converted at posting can\'t be restored to shortcode.)
Attachment description can\'t be edit while uploading.
Hide boosts by this user from your home TL
Show boosts by this user from your home TL
please input name of new list.
Delete the list member \"%1$s\" from list \"%2$s\"?
Lists is not supported on this server.
You are not following %1$s yet. Would you like to follow and then add to list?
Can\'t add user to list:\nPlease retry 2,3 times. Or if user is \"locked\", please wait until for approval of follow request.
Can\'t add user to list:\nfollow operation failed.
%1$s has been moved. Would you like to check %2$s ?
Media attachment (image) bytes size limit (Unit:MB. The default is 8)
Media attachment (movie) bytes size limit (Unit:MB. The default is 40)
Media attachment (Pixelfed) bytes size limit (Unit:MB. The default is 15)
Subway Tooter can\'t handle URI \"%1$s\". Please select other app.
The type of media attachment is \"%1$s\". ST can\'t handle it, but you can try open in browser.
Can\'t repeat downloading same URL in a few seconds.
Swipe leftwards to delete. You may need reload the check whether it is set.
Can\'t use domain block from pseudo account.
Can\'t use domain block for your server.
Force adding gap when refreshing top
Avatar icon size (Unit:dp. default:48. app restart required)
Avatar icon round ratio (Unit:%. default:33. app restart required)
Don\'t round corner of avatar icon (app restart required)
Not chosen when tapping system notification
The account is from another server. Send an anonymized copy of the report there as well?
Append attachment URL to content text
Disable Fav/BT notifications from this user
Enable Fav/BT notifications from this user
Pull notification check interval (Unit: minutes, default:15, min:15)
Boost private status from %1$s ? It\'s shown to all followers.
You can\'t boost private toots by another person.
Push subscription is not supported on this server (version %1$s).
Can\'t prepare FCM device ID. Please try again later.
Can\'t prepare install ID. Please try again later.

Due to exporting application data or restoring from backup, this access token may be used by other devices as well. Because access tokens that are not used by other devices are required to use push notifications, we recommend updating the access token.
This server has no push subscription API.
Your access token does not contains push scope. updating access token is recommended.
Not following anyone, or hidden by setting.
No followers, or hidden by setting.
Even if you choose to hide social graphs, yourself can see it.
If the remote user choose to hide the social graph, only the followings/followers on this server will be displayed.
Can\'t change account while using redraft.
Delete base status before posting. All of favourites/boosts will be lost. Replies will be disconnected. Media attachments will not kept on Mastodon pre-2.4.1 . Are you sure?

Notification TL font size
(Unit: sp. leave empty to default. app restart required)
…
…
Notification TL icon size (Unit:dp. default:24. app restart required)
Regex filter matches to empty string.
Irreversible. Drop instead of hide. Filtered toots will disappear irreversibly, even if the filter is removed later.
Whole word. Recommended to enable only phrases consisting of alphanumeric characters.
Scroll to top when tapping visible column in column strip
Default text when composing toot. (Does not affect to quick toot bar, nor switching account in toot composition screen)
There is no account available for this purpose.
In Misskey, only direct replies to target note are enumerated. Not all descendants can be displayed.
This Misskey server does not provide app secret in the response of /api/app/create API. Please consider updating the Misskey service version to server admin.
Boost button size (Unit:dp, default=40, app restart required)
Timeout for embedded media viewer (Unit:seconds, app restart(delete from app history) required)
Missing closeable column in visible range.
Don\'t use (Chrome/Firefox) \"Custom Tabs\" when opening links
\"Timeline around the specified time\" feature has limitation for the server Mastodon pre-2.6.0. It is impossible to get a little newer timeline from the specified time.
This note has been deleted at %1$s
Use \"Quote Toot\". (Misskey or some customized Mastodon server)
Boost button alpha opacity (Unit:%. app restart required. also affected of content text alpha.)
Push subscription API is not supported on this server (maybe Pleroma).
#InstanceTicker\n(c)2018-2020 MiyonMiyon. Released under the MIT License.
Create new account on specified server.
I agree to the terms of service
The username can not contain \"@\" or \"/\".
Can\'t read follow list from pseudo account.
Can\'t change account when editing scheduled status.
Delete scheduled status before posting. Are you sure?
Reply icon size (Unit: dp. Default:24. App restart required)
Header icon size (Unit: dp. Default:24. App restart required)
Header text size (Unit: sp. Default:14. App restart required)
Column strip icon size (Unit: dp. Default:30. App restart required)
Scheduled status requires Mastodon 2.7.0 or later.
Show notifications quick filter in column setting (app restart required)
Show acct (instead of user name) in system notification
Show clear button on search bar (app restart required)
Don\'t remove deleted toots from timeline
Boost this status from %1$s ? It\'s shown to all followers.
use ZWS instead of space for custom emoji separator
Always mark media as sensitive (when posting)
Missing app that can receive ACTION_SEND.
Select the destination app, then back to app setting.
Sorry, app chooser works on Android 5.1+.
the share target app is not installed. please configure it in \"App setting/behavior\".
maximum character count in status (0:default. if server provides max_toot_chars, this setting is ignored.)
Profile directory is not supported on Misskey
Status bar color (app restart required. pre-Android 6 can\'t adjust icon and text color)
Navigation bar color (app restart required. pre-Android 8 can\'t adjust icon color)
Pixelfed does not allow reply with media attachment.
Pixelfed does not allow post (not reply) without media attachment.
Hashtag %1$s contains both of ASCII and non-ASCII characters. It may be a typo. Are you sure?
Warn if hashtag contains both of ASCII and non-ASCII characters
Enable connect to Pixelfed server (experimental. many problems)
Reason why you want to create an account on this server (optional)
When using quick toot, omit account selection if possible
Timeline line spacing (floating number is used as line spacing multiplier. leave empty to default. app restart required)
Always expand sub-items of context menu
column reload required to apply filter.
choose preset or input language code
Push notification will not work because server misconfiguration. Server public key is missing.
Push notification will not work because server misconfiguration. Server public key is empty.
The toots made by old Mastodon may contain emojione\'s shortcode even if the server have been updated.
Language filter is not saved. exit anyway?
Quote toot (Misskey or some customized Mastodon server)
